SNATCHER.raw_line: Wake his lordship.The unspeakable has happened. We must speak of it immediately!Boxtroll monsters have stolen a child.They're no doubt picking their teeth with his adorable baby bones by now!STOP!Oh, oof! That's not the worst of it! Next they'll come after......OUR CHEESES!They'll stop at nothing.Oh, I don't want money.I want one of those.Alright then. But prepare to say bye bye to your Brie. Cheerio to your Cheddar. Goodbye to your...For a white hat?I will destroy every last boxtroll in this town!Hear ye! Hear ye! Good citizens of Cheesebridge, the curfew is in force. Don't dawdle or the beasts will tear you limb from limb!They will add your flesh to their rivers of blood and mountains of bones.Child! Do you want to end up like the Trubshaw Baby?Dragged underground and feasted upon one year ago this very night?!Lock your windows! Bolt your doors! Hide anything that is not bolted down.Hide your cheese. Hide your tender and delicious babies!Beware the bloodthirsty monsters! They'll fry your eyes, gnaw on your knees, gobble your gizzards... Beware! BEWARE!GENTLEMEN!Look at all these boxes left lying about. How curious, how peculiar. I do believe... evil is afoot.MR. GRISTLE!ACQUIRE THEM!Hmm. Someone's out past curfew. Very dangerous.All I saw was filthy boxtroll monsters.Miss Portley-Rind. Allow me to escort you home.Yes, how did this hat find itself aaaaall the way out here?Hmmm. Must've died down. Suddenly!Oh, but as a gentleman, I insist.Lord Portley-Rind!Deepest apologies, your Lordship. But I found something out in the street that belongs to you.Oh, don't I know it, sirs.Fortunately, we still have our little... agreeeeement.When I destroy every last boxtroll in this town, I shall earn my white hat... and join you in the Tasting Room.I was told the wind had something to do with it.Sorry! Can't stay. Too much work to do. Miss Portley-Rind, your Lordship, Sirs. I bid you good night. I'm sure we'll be seeing each other again very, very soon.Don't forget. I'm a size six-and-a- half. Order ahead.Ugh!Ladies and gents, From the long- lost land of Crackerslovakia -- MADAME FROU FROU!Wrong, Mr. Pickles!A boxtroll cannot CHOOSE a new life because a boxtroll does not ASPIRE to be anything more than a weak, lowly pest. But a man -- a great man! And his...... stooges ... can choose to change their lives. Our dreams are in our grasp!Let us be dream-graspers, fate- snatchers, destiny-takers! Let us grasp our dreams and shove them down everyone's throat! Am I not right?YES!Now, gentlemen. What better way to dream than to walk in the shoes of those to whom we aspire? Mr. Pickles, fetch the--Cheese.Men, don your white hats.(tucking a napkin into hisMarvelous! Then let us begin.ENOUGH!Mmmm!I say, old chaps, it's quite, um... QUITE--Yes! Those things! Etcetera etcetera, big words, chummy banter...Where is he going? Is he getting more cheese?What?Isn't this nice? Chewing the cheddar with the big cheessses. Holding my own-- --With sssophissstication and sssavoir faire!Thisss is where I belong!Well not here! In this rotten factory!I belong up there!In the tasting room, supping on the choicest cheeses... Everyone in town bowing down to me, like a gentleman, a lord with a white hat!It's a time-honored tradition.Aaaarrgh!Stand back peasants! You don't touch your King!King Archibald Snatcher. Yes, I shall be king too, why not?HE won't let me! That pompous Portley-Rind and his gaggle of giggling sycophants.Father always said if you worked hard, you'd get a white hat! And what did he ever get! NOTHING!I've worked my hump off for this town!Wading through wet garbage in the middle of the night, crawling after monsters! What has Portley-Rind ever done. Eat some cheese, run the government, NOTHING!What has Portley-Rind ever done. Eat some cheese, run the government, NOTHING!I'll rip that hat off of Portley- Rind's head... WHOA HOAH!I'm alright. Just give me a hand.You.GIVE ME THAT HAT!I'll make those brie stuffed pigs bow down to me! I'm going to be somebody!AHHHHH! UGH. OOF. GAHHH!Oh, hello. Where were we?Ah yes... right. Open the workshop Mr. Trout!Huh? Where is the beast?It can't be. It's not possible. It's not right!Don't stand there gawking. Get him!Mr. Trout!TEN YEARS and NOW you show up?!You'll find out soon enough!SHOOT MR. PICKLES! Shoot!Yes, well, I need them. They're my ticket to a white hat, Trubshaw Baby!Miss Portley-Rind! What a surprise!Does your.. does your father know you're here?Looks like the Boxtrolls have a new victim, miss. And her name is YOU.They're getting away Mr. Gristle!If Lord Portley-Rind finds out that boy is alive, it will ruin everything I've worked for!Bah...Come on! I'm being reasonable. I can be unreasonable.Maybe if I hold on to your son...Zees parties are so confusing. No?How's that for an entrance!My, my, what a surprise. Don't look like your little friends wanna run, does it? How strange, how peculiar. No, wait, it's exactly as I expected!NEVER GONNA HAPPEN, TRUBSHAW!Time to earn my white hat!Give up, Trubshaw! Boxtrolls lost looooong time ago. These miserable pests will never be a match for a man with dream! MR. GRISTLE!ACQUIRE THEM!(humming... then in normalTrubshaw senior loved his kid, same as regular faaaaathers did....He was once. Won't get much out of him now, though. A decade hanging upside down scrambled his noodles good.Still, did a fine job designing this beauty. Best inventor in town, your dad. Working with the best little builders.Yell all you want, boy. They ain't gonna run. You can't change nature.I'm coming down, men! I want to pull the crushing lever myself! It's the little moments.Well, good speech.All but one.Hear ye! Hear ye! Good citizens of Cheesebridge, come out of your homes! The curfew has been lifted!Fear not, the monsters have been vanquished! Your streets are SAFE!Join me! Your purger of pests! Your white knight who has taken back the night!Lord Portley-Riiiiind!I come bearing the most delightful news.Show him lads.Flattened to extinction. Every last, slimy one of them.Your lordship, I said I would not rest until I caught every last boxtroll and I am a man of my word.With this boxtroll, I will end their reign of terror.I'd say that deserves a white hat, don't you?No. Methinks a deed of this magnitude deserves something a bit more... significant.I want YOUR hat.Do the honors.Musician, drum-roll!Mr. Trout! Lower the beast down.With this hat, I, Archibald Penelope Snatcher...(repeating after Portley-Proudly swear to uphold the dignity of the White Hat.I... I am befuddled as your lordship! I... I crushed them myself!Wow, good speech.I'll take my white hat now.Loooord POORTLEY-RIIIIND! Come out, come out, come out!Whoah whoa.Get your grimy paws off of my machine!You vile little brat!You ungrateful stooges!Mine!Come back, you loony!Stop destroying my indestructible machine!AHHHHHHH!!!!YOU FILTHY MONSTER!(with effort, stranglingMONSTER?Huh?RAWR!!!GIF. ME. MY. HAT.NOW TO THE TASHTING ROOM!Men, don your White Hatsh...ISH TASHTING TIME!Shut up! Enough shtalling.Yesh... rich bouquet, cheesy cheese-like... OW!You bit me... wif yor... MOUTH?!I have made me, boy.This is my dessshhtiny.Mmm, aromatic?... Oaky?... With an undertone of a mother's smile on a WARM SPRING--

LORD PORTLEY-RIND.raw_line: What is it, Snatcher?No.A horrible tragedy. Let's deal with it in the morning!My Gouda!?You're the town exterminator. I'll pay whatever it takes.A White Hat? You?! Absurd!Very well. Every boxtroll gone. With proof!Settle down, men, settle down. Important town business to discuss. First on the docket: more complaints of crumbling bridges.I suppose we could do with a nibble first.(mouth full, readingWell, okay, okay. A quick reminder, tomorrow is Trubshaw Baby Remembrance Day. And we all know what that means... a performance by Madame Frou Frou.A lady like that is like a fine brie. Raw. Dangerous. Maybe a little stinky, but one taste and you'll be begging for... mmm . . .WINIFRED!Winifred go on. Off to bed. Off to bed! Come on, come on.Shoo. Shoo. Shoo.Yes, yes one moment! Winifred, proper girls should not be obsessing over grotesque monsters.Mmm hmm. Yes.Hmm? Um. Yes, Winifred.What? Uh... White Hat? Right. What.. Oh, seems to have been smudged by a bit of brie. Be a dear and have the butler give it a wash, would you?Now gentlemen, I apologize... sorry! Back to important White Hat business... Pass the Camembert!Did you hear something?What in Gouda's name is going on? Archibald Snatcher?My White Hat!I'll take that... Now, now, Snatcher one doesn't acquire a white hat by simply-- --picking it up... off the street.A white hat indicates privilege, prestige, position! It must be earned.Um.. ehhh...Good lord. Not sure who should be more terrified - the boxtrolls or us.Now, how the devil did my hat get outside in the first place?The wind, eh?Hmmmm.. Winnie...Not another word.Bed!Yoo hoo! I'm your biggest fan, Frou Frou.Oof. Very good.Distinguished members of the cheese guild. We were here to celebrate the successful fund-raising for a new children's hospital! But my fellow White Hats and I decided the money would be better spent on this. I present: THE BRIEHEMOTH!What is going on here?NO NO NO NO NOOOO!What have you done!?Do you know how expensive that cheese was?We might as well have built a children's hospital!Not now.Have you any idea how long it will take my men to fish it out of the river?!You insult our guest of honor?Who are you?!You know this... creature?Enough!Winifred!I don't want to see you again, do you hear me?Leave my house. Now!There, there. You poor, poor dear.Mr. Snatcher, what the devil is this?Yes, well. I'm not sure... We'd have to take a vote...There's probably some, uh, paperwork... then have a hat shipped in...My hat?All right. All right. As soon as that boxtroll is dead, you may have... my... hat.Yes. And then we can eat cheese together. In the Tasting Room.Repeat after me: With this hat, I, state your name...With profound esteem for dairy and dairy products... proudly swear to uphold the dignity of the White Hat.Not now, Winifred!And henceforth, whereupon and thereupon... the placing of this hat... we shall conclude by... ushering our newest member into a world of privilege, pride, and pasteurized dairy!What is going on here?!Evidently not! That was the closest you will ever come to a White Hat. (THEN, twirling hisHe lied to us and to poor Madame Frou Frou!Snatcher!Why is he talking like Madame Frou - Oh my God! I regret so much.AHHHH!RUN!AHH!Mine!It's not funny! No, no, no!Winnifred!Well... what about Broderick's hat? It's just as white and fluffy.Oh take it.Just let go of my daughter.I present the tastiest cheese known to man. Made from the milk of the male, lactating fruit bats in Borneo. Aged for centuries in SECRET--Oh, my Winnikens!My little angel. My weird little angel.

MR. PICKLES.raw_line: Huh.You ever seen someone's foot be evil, Mr. Trout?My foot had a pretty nasty bunion once. I wouldn't say the foot itself was evil.Wrinkly ol' bunion looked like my grandmum. Had to saw her off. The bunion, not my grandmum.Come on, ya squirmy monster. Your days of evil-doin' are over.They must, right? Why else would they hide from us. We are the good guys.Another villain off the streets!They're right there, Mr. Trout!Hark! Here come The Exterminators!Huh.Hark! Here come The Exterminators... OF JUSTICE!Over there Mr. Trout!You ever wonder what they're thinkin' `bout, Mr. Trout?Ah. Wonderin' why they chose to be evil, disgusting monsters instead of good guys like us!Best chums?That's why your name is the boss, boss!Shoes?Oh dear.Are you sure about this, boss? You know what cheese can do to you...That's what I meant then.Someone's got the cheese fits again.I think you've had enough for today, boss.Yup. Nothing terrifying about that.You're not wrong, boss.Very clever.You've never been wrong, boss.Use your breathing.Tell us more about when you'll be king.Now, now Boss, you be careful up there.And it's growing back.Come on down from there, boss.Boss, boss!Ugh. Mother of sausages!AAAH! Mister Snatcher!AHH! I got him! Do it!NOW! NOW! NOW!!That is correct.That's our boxtroll! Give `im back!It'd be easier if he'd stop moving!Stop moving!Thank you.Oops.Don't make no sense. That's evil prevailing over good.I think we're all saying the same thing here.But, just in different ways.Dramatical!Never seen one do that before!Goodness always triumphs over evil... right Mr. Trout? Mr. Trout?I'm still sixty to seventy percent certain that's us. A couple of good guys vanquishing evil and all that.I thought this was all gonna be a show, like with Frou Frou. I brought my mustache and everything.We're just doing our jobs.I knew that's how people saw us.A second chapter!Redeemed!So this is what all the fuss is about?What do you think, Mr. Trout?`Ere you have a go.Is this what you wanted, boss?Pull!Eww!Yeah... all happy `n tidy.Not sure what we'd do next, though.Hmm.Free from evil.Ya ever think about the universe, Mr. Trout?What if our world is just like a tiny speck...And there are giants looking down on us?It's actually them moving us.Like that, just there, me blinking. That would've taken them a day.I mean, none of them are going home. They're having to do this bit. And now this bit. And this bit. I mean, this should stop.It's too much. And then they'd have had to've done me talking about the blink. And it never ends. I think they make a meal of it, to be honest. I don't know how they get the time. They've got to have other jobs. It's more like a hobby. Y'know, like stamp collecting, something you do in your free time.

EGGS.raw_line: Fish!Fish?Do do doo do doo...Wake up!OOOH! Hee hee hee.Ha! Missed me!Oooh!Wheels!What?!This way.Shoe! Come on.Boy?Why would she call me that?RUN!Grab hold!This way!No!Why do we do this, Shoe...Carry on like everything is normal? They drag us away and we do nothing...I look like one of them. Sort of.I'll find you, Fish!Wow...Ahh!AHHHH!!!AHHHH!! Eek.Ehh! Oof. Eek!Hey. Oww!What?!But she's lying.Wait! I saw you last night.And they took Fish, and... I don't know where they took him...Ah!Yes.We went underground and they--Huh?What?MY FAMILY-I need to find the Men in Red Hats!The Men in Red Hats!How do I get there?It's not true, you know. We don't eat babies!Fish!Fish.SHH!Let's go... Come on, come on!Eww! You have got to help me, Fish!Uggggh.But.. you're all alive!?Huh?What are you doing with them?Boxtrolls don't hurt anyone! Let them go!RUN!It's not just us. All the others are alive too!We saw them!Oil Can, Wheels, all of them!Yes!I don't know, but The Redhats have them building something in their factory.I TOLD you, we don't eat people!No I'm not, I'm a boxtroll! Eggs the boxtroll.I... I can't right now.I- I have a speech impediment!I slept on them funny!Hey!It's not true is it Fish? I'm a boxtroll like you, aren't I?He says I was... given to him.I was given to you?Who gave me to you?Oh, sorry. He says a long time ago there was a kind man---- The one man in town who saw they weren't monsters...... But builders... like him.Snatcher wanted him to build something...And when the Redhats tried to take me away from him...And then they...They killed him.What's a father?Oh! Like Fish.You have a father!We can tell him I'm the Trubshaw Baby... and the boxtrolls didn't eat me. And he'll stop Snatcher!He's a father, isn't he?But he's the only father we have.Please help us.I promise!Me... a proper boy.Okay.Oh, right."It's a pleasure to meet you."Which one is your father?I'm Eggs?Its a pleasure to meet you.But which ones are the ladies?!It's a pleasure to meet you.Even if I don't mean it!And, it's a pleasure to meet you.I was right!It's a pleasure to meet you... it's a pleasure to meet you... it's a pleasure to meet youuuuu! Oooooh!Yum. Mmmthatsgood.Huh? Oh!YOU'RE SNATC--You're a liar! When I tell Winnie's father the truth, he'll-- OOF!What?!We have to get to your father!We'll WHAT?You made me get out of my box!Snatcher is here.Winnie!I uh...Ahhh!Lord Winnie's Father...People of the upper world -- Archibald Snatcher has lied to you all!He told you that boxtrolls are monsters -- that they steal children -- but they don't. They would never hurt anyone. I know because...Because... I am the Trubshaw Baby!What?!If you won't listen to me, ask Snatcher himself.A proper boy.But he's not a...You said fathers were supposed to help. That they took care of kids.People are just mean and selfish. They're monsters.Well, I don't want to be a boy anymore.It was a pleasure meeting you.And, Winnie, I really do mean it.We have to leave the cavern.We're not safe down here anymore. Come on...I said, we have to leave now!Snatcher is planning something! We have to get out of here.Come on let's go. Now!Get up! No! NO! (shaking Knickers out ofFish, help me.NO! I'm not a boxtroll!I'm sorry. I... I didn't mean it. Please come out. Fish.He's here.AHH!Get up! That thing will kill you!You have to get up. Please!No!Fish! Shoe!NO! Please!What the...?Who are you?I don't know.He's my, you're my... are you my father?No, no no, don't hide. Fish! Shoe! RUN! Get up, get up and run! Sparky. Sweets, run!I don't understand.I tried. They won't listen.Father?Fish, Fish, everyone! Listen! I'm a boxtroll and I stopped hiding, so you can too! Stand up for yourselves! We can fight back! Don't be afraid anymore. Sparky! Fragile! Get up! Get up and fight!Just stand up and take a step. Please! Do it for me!No! No! No! NOOOOOO! Fish, Shoe, Sparky...Yeah. Yeah look what I did. They're crushed.Huh?You're alive! You're all alive! But how?! I saw you crushed!Oh... sorry. He says they were hiding and then they heard me yelling at them...... We can fight back! Don't be afraid anymore. Sparky! Fragile! Get up! Get up and fight. Stand up! Fight back. Please! Do it for me!You got out of your boxes! You did it!My father.You were right. Thank you.No more hiding, right?RIGHT?You built that thing! You can take it apart!Tear it down!We need to put out the fire!Whoops!Fish, grab hold!That's right! Pull it over there!AHHHH!I'm nothing like you. You're the monster!Please, Snatcher, let her go. You don't have to do this--Don't do it. It won't change who you are.Cheese, hats, boxes - they don't make you. You make you.Winnie!Where's Fish?You guys seen Fish?Thanks!Have you seen Fish?Look what I found!And now we go like this.

WINNIE.raw_line: Boxtrolls! They could come eat my face off at any moment. I'd better warn father.Father!But Father! I saw boxtrolls again!They're right outside. They could come rip the flesh off my bones any moment!I'm not obsessed! I just can't stop imagining them gnawing off my toes and stringing them together as a necklace! Father? Father.If they kidnapped me and slurped up my intestines like noodles, would you give up your white hat to save me?Father!BUT--I'll give your hat a wash all right.Ha!Uh oh.Who... who's there?Who are you, boy?I... I saw a boy.I can escort myself, thank you.If you'll just give me my father's hat back.The... wind! Blew it, right out the window. Very windy tonight!There's no need to go inside.Can I have the hat back now?Please.Huh?Father, I'm sorry--Father, I'm sorry! I didn't mean to. Well, at first I did, but I think this situation offers a great opportunity for a father and daughter to discuss their feelings----WAIT! I saw something out there. A boy with boxtrolls--But Father I really-I did see a boy...Me! Pick me! Me!Move aside! Pick me...I saw a boy with boxtrolls last night! Maybe your audience would like to hear-- OOF!What do you want!You're the worst pickpocket I have ever seen.Here, buy yourself a book on how to be a better thief.You were with the boxtrolls last night?Whoah! I KNEW IT! I KNEW IT! I KNEW IT!Father didn't believe me but I KNEW IT! How did you escape?!Did they drag you down to their hideous caves?Were there mountains of baby bones and rivers of blood?Did they eat your family?Did they let you watch?! I mean, make you watch?!TELL ME EVERYTHING!You bit me.You bit me with your mouth.The boxtroll exterminators? They live down on Curd's Way.Curds Way? Milk turns into it.We? What do you mean we?Come back here! TELL ME EVERYTHING!TRUBSHAW BABY!?I knew there was something strange about you!No of course not! But wait til I tell him! The Trubshaw Baby! Alive!What are you doing? Unhand me!What have you dragged me into?Ohh!STAY AWAY FROM ME! Someone, help!!! Wealthy girl in danger!If you're going to eat me just get it over with. I'm sure I'm delicious.Hmm?What's going on?!I said what's going on? Why aren't they ripping out our eyeballs and eating our faces?And where are the rivers of blood and mountains of bones?! I WAS PROMISED MOUNTAINS OF BONES!Why do you keep saying "we"? You're not one of them! You're a boy!Oh really? Then let's see you fit in your box.Mm hmm.You don't talk like them!Your ears aren't pointy!Oh for goodness sake. Give me your hand!I don't bite.See? You're not like them.You're one of us. You're a boy, Eggs. Or should I call you the Trubshaw baby?See?! I was right! Now admit it, admit you stole him!Is he confessing?Ha, right again! I- ...wait, what?What's he saying?They what?I think that kind man was your father.Um... well... a father is the one who raises you... looks after you. Loves you.Yes...... No. They're supposed to be like that man in the story. Someone who'll do anything to help you. They always listen and never get angry...They guide you when you don't know what to do. They're there when it's dark and you're scared or lonely, and they are never, ever too busy to talk to you...Well, he doesn't really listen to children.You don't know what he's like.If I agree to help, you have to do exactly as I say.All right, first thing's first... off with the box.Stop that!Alright, you petty thieves. Bring me your loot!Oh, thanks.No.This might work.No.Oh yes!No!Yes!You look like a proper boy.How do we get out of this place?AHHHHHHHH!Come on, Eggs.STOP!You don't scratch there in public! That's why they're called... ... privates.For this is to work, there are a few things you need to know. When you meet someone, you must look them in the eye and shake hands.What are you doing?! Put those down!Like this.The other one.Then you say, "It's a pleasure to meet you."And you say that even if you're not pleased to meet them.Just stick close, okay?Lord Portley-Rind. He's usually making speeches about cheese.Hello, mommy dear.--Bert. Eggsbert. Is a normal name... that he has.No, no. You kiss a lady's hand.Don't move. I'll be right back.There you are.You can't just cut through.We'll dance!Like this. One two three... one two three.Just make a box.With your feet, silly!That's it, Eggs. You're dancing!Who? Where?Frou Frou?Uh oh! EGGS LOOK OUT!Did you hear a word he said?!BUT FATHER--He is with me father.He's my friend. What he said is TRUE--But...Eggs, wait!Well, they're supposed to.Not all of us. You aren't.Eggs...EGGS!Father! Father!STOP! STOP!Your JOBS? Are you pest exterminators or evil henchmen?!You don't have to do this!Sure, yes, whatever! Just let him go!STOP IT!FISH!AHEM?Boxtrolls aren't monsters. They never ate the Trubshaw Baby, he's right there with Fish and--Your father?Oh Mister Snatcher...... how did this hat get alllll the waaayyy out here?Ooh!Over here!IT DOESN'T REACH! PULL IT HARDER!ALL TOGETHER!There I was, trapped in his sweaty armpit......Until he swelled like a balloon and.. POP! ---- An ocean of guts exploded over us like a hurricane of YUCK!Huh?(sotto voce, quietly toAnd now I will tell the heroic story of the Naked Boxtrolls and the Crusher of DOOOOOOM!
